channel.title: Need opinions on a new project
channel.description:
Warning: It is a bit messy right now. I will tidy it up when I learn how. This is the very early stages of what will at the very least be a NPC Editor tool. So far it can only output combat level, and maximum rolls for anything combat related, and it is all purely visual. Here's a few screenshots:
Default Man: [url=http://prntscr.com/4m4brm]http://prntscr.com/4m4brm[/url]
Fight Caves Tz-Kih: [url=http://prntscr.com/4m4cbr]http://prntscr.com/4m4cbr[/url] Tz-Kek: [url=http://prntscr.com/4m4cqv]http://prntscr.com/4m4cqv[/url] Tok-Xil: [url=http://prntscr.com/4m4ejy]http://prntscr.com/4m4ejy[/url] Yt-MejKot: [url=http://prntscr.com/4m4ewi]http://prntscr.com/4m4ewi[/url] Ket-Zek: [url=http://prntscr.com/4m4fbc]http://prntscr.com/4m4fbc[/url] TzTok-Jad (As it was originally meant to be): [url=http://prntscr.com/4m4fnf]http://prntscr.com/4m4fnf[/url]
Barrows (No effects) Ahrim: [url=http://prntscr.com/4m4i00]http://prntscr.com/4m4i00[/url] Dharok: [url=http://prntscr.com/4m4jpw]http://prntscr.com/4m4jpw[/url] Guthan: [url=http://prntscr.com/4m4l6l]http://prntscr.com/4m4l6l[/url] Karil: [url=http://prntscr.com/4m4lsg]http://prntscr.com/4m4lsg[/url] Torag: [url=http://prntscr.com/4m4mbg]http://prntscr.com/4m4mbg[/url] Verac: [url=http://prntscr.com/4m4mu2]http://prntscr.com/4m4mu2[/url]

item.title: Need opinions on a new project
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:2, topic:546676”]Looks like it would be helpful if people ever started using custom monsters.[/quote]It takes a long time to animate, especially an npc.

Read full topic
item.source: Need opinions on a new project

item.title: Need opinions on a new project
item.dc:creator: @zeifyl zeifyl
item.description:
@zeifyl wrote:

Warning: It is a bit messy right now. I will tidy it up when I learn how.
This is the very early stages of what will at the very least be a NPC Editor tool.
So far it can only output combat level, and maximum rolls for anything combat related, and it is all purely visual.
Here’s a few screenshots:

Default
Man: http://prntscr.com/4m4brm

Fight Caves
Tz-Kih: http://prntscr.com/4m4cbr
